burlap.domain.singleagent.gridworld

Class GridWorldDomain.WallToPF

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    GridWorldDomain

    public class GridWorldDomain.WallToPF
extends PropositionalFunction
    Propositional function for indicating if a wall is in a given position relative to the agent position
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

        public GridWorldDomain.WallToPF(java.lang.String name,
                        Domain domain,
                        java.lang.String[] parameterClasses,
                        int direction)
        Initializes the function.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the function
        domain - the domain of the function
        parameterClasses - the object class parameter types
        direction - the unit distance direction from the agent to check for a wall (0,1,2,3 corresponds to north,south,east,west).
